thread.title: Blues' Schwartz out at least 12 weeks with fractured ankle
thread.title_full: Blues' Schwartz out at least 12 weeks with fractured ankle

author: Colorado theater shooter James Holmes assaulted in prison
title: Blues' Schwartz out at least 12 weeks with fractured ankle
text:
Blues' Schwartz out at least 12 weeks with fractured ankle Associated Press 5 hrs ago Â© (AP Photo/Ann Heisenfelt St. Louis Blues left wing Jaden Schwartz (17) gets into position for a face-off during the second period of Game 6 of an NHL hockey first-round playoff series against the Minnesota Wild in St. Paul, Minn., Sunday, April 26, 2015. (AP Photo/Ann Heisenfelt) ST. LOUIS (AP) -- St. Louis Blues forward Jaden Schwartz will be out at least 12 weeks because of a fractured left ankle.
AdChoices The team said Saturday he was taken to a hospital for surgery after slipping and crashing into one of the goals during practice a day earlier.
Schwartz has four assists in seven games. He was a first-round pick in the 2010 draft and for his career has 139 points in 214 regular-season games.
